attributes.action: Change the current benefit and tax credit system
attributes.additional_details:
The current estimated benefits and tax credits bill for 2015/16 approximately equates to £217 billion  pounds.
Population currently at 65,009,728 people.

(monthly allowance of £1,322.75 based on the current National Living Wage of £8.25 per hour with an average of 37hrs per week)
attributes.background:
to overhaul the current UK Benefits and Tax Credits system and put into place a standard Government Living Allowance for all people currently employed and unemployed.
By abolishing the current system and introducing a flat rate Government Paid Living allowance will reduce the bill by £129 billion.
